text: Hello! How are you?
Im very good how are you doing today?
I'm good thank you! So according to this I'm supposed to tell you a bit about the Save the Children organization. Have you heard of it before?
No i would be interested in learning
So I just looked it up and they do a lot of work for children around the world. They do some work in and out of USA to give kids access to health care, education, and shelter.
Thats very beneficial.  Especially for third world country that have limited resources
Definitely! They do a lot of work with emergency response stuff too which is pretty cool.
If we can donate alot to these organizations alot can be accomplished in the world.
Yes definitely. It doesn't even take much. A couple cents could really help these kids!
definitely.  The more the merrier however anything as little as 10 cents can make a huge impact
Oh yeah. That and they're pretty transparent which is good. It's not all given to the filthy rich CEO.
If we can get a group of Investors this organization can reach a larger spectrum
I've never even heard of it before today which is pretty sad.
Yeah that means they need to develop a good marketing strategy to attract more attention
Hmmm, I wonder if this is what that is?
Yea they should hire a specialist that can go into social media like Facebook, Instagram, and other sites to build a presence
That's so true! So I guess now is the part where I ask if you'd like to donate any of your compensation to them?
Sure I like their mission and believe it can help a long way to help others
Yay! How much would you like to donate?
I would love to donate $.50 cents
Sounds good, thank you! Have a good night!
